price: Kuma akwai daga mutãne* wanda yake sayar da ransa, dõmin nẽman yardar Allah: KumaAllah Mai tausayi ga bãyi ne.
arabic: وَمِنَ ٱلنَّاسِ مَن يَشۡرِي نَفۡسَهُ ٱبۡتِغَآءَ مَرۡضَاتِ ٱللَّهِۚ وَٱللَّهُ رَءُوفُۢ بِٱلۡعِبَادِ
footnotes: * Bayãnin mũmini sõsai a cikin Musulmi da halayensa, a sanshi dõmin a dõgara a kansa.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wamina al-nāsi man yashrī nafsahu ib'tighāa marḍāti al-lahi wal-lahu raūfun bil-ʿibādi
